thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 12 of 218
thread.title: Melissa

author: Melissa
title: Melissa
text: What started as an embarrassing phone call turned into a sigh of relief. Everyone I spoke to was professional and friendly. I had so many questions which were all answered with no judgement. Malik was the representative who helped me, and he was awesome. I annoyed him with a million phone calls and he did nothing but make sure every request was taken care of. Thank you so much Malik for all of your help!
